sourceColumn":"loan_status","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"LOAN_STATUS","targetType":"VARCHAR2","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"VARCHAR2"},{"sourceColumn":"loan_amount","sourceType":"double","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"double","targetColumn":"LOAN_AMOUNT","targetType":"NUMBER","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"NUMBER"},{"sourceColumn":"emi_amount","sourceType":"double","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"double","targetColumn":"EMI_AMOUNT","targetType":"NUMBER","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"NUMBER"},{"sourceColumn":"tenure_months","sourceType":"integer","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"integer","targetColumn":"TENURE_MONTHS","targetType":"NUMBER","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"NUMBER"},{"sourceColumn":"income","sourceType":"double","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"double","targetColumn":"INCOME","targetType":"NUMBER","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"NUMBER"},{"sourceColumn":"expenses","sourceType":"double","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"double","targetColumn":"EXPENSES","targetType":"NUMBER","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"NUMBER"},{"sourceColumn":"amount_in_usd","sourceType":"double","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"double","targetColumn":"AMOUNT_IN_USD","targetType":"NUMBER","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"NUMBER"}],"componentId":7,"componentName":"DB sink","rank":0,"dataSourceName":"AWS_Oracle","displayRows":0,"dependencies":[3],"options":{"numPartitions":"4","batchsize":"1000"},"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.DBSyncComponent","dataSourceLogicalName":"","executionOption":"allparentpassorfail","excludeNotification":"N"},{"partitionOptions":{"partitionType":"","name":""},"easyQueryDefJson":{"sqlQuery":""},"componentId":12,"componentName":"SQL 12","tableName":"SQL_12","category":"Processor","componentType":"SQL","rank":0,"dataSourceName":"","displayRows":50,"dependencies":[9],"options":{"dbTable":"SELECT *
FROM (
    SELECT
        TRANSACTION_ID,
        ACCOUNT_NUMBER,
        CUSTOMER_NAME,
        TRANSACTION_DATE,
        TRANSACTION_AMOUNT,
        TRANSACTION_TYPE,
        MERCHANT,
        CATEGORY,
        CURRENCY,
        EXCHANGE_RATE,
        ACCOUNT_BALANCE,
        BRANCH_CODE,
        IS_FRAUD,
        CREDIT_SCORE,
        LOAN_STATUS,
        COALESCE(LOAN_AMOUNT, 0) AS LOAN_AMOUNT,
        COALESCE(EMI_AMOUNT, 0) AS EMI_AMOUNT,
        COALESCE(TENURE_MONTHS, 0) AS TENURE_MONTHS,
        COALESCE(INCOME, 0) AS INCOME,
        COALESCE(EXPENSES, 0) AS EXPENSES,
        COALESCE(AMOUNT_IN_USD, 0) AS AMOUNT_IN_USD,
        
        -- Fraud Label
        CASE
            WHEN IS_FRAUD = 1 THEN 'FRAUD'
            ELSE 'LEGIT'
        END AS FRAUD_LABEL,
        
        -- Loan-to-Income Ratio
        COALESCE(
            CASE
                WHEN INCOME > 0 THEN ROUND(LOAN_AMOUNT / INCOME, 4)
                ELSE 0
            END, 0
        ) AS LOAN_TO_INCOME_RATIO,
        
        -- EMI as % of Income
        COALESCE(
            CASE
                WHEN INCOME > 0 THEN ROUND((EMI_AMOUNT * TENURE_MONTHS) / INCOME * 100, 2)
                ELSE 0
            END, 0
        ) AS EMI_PCT_OF_INCOME,
        
        -- Credit Score Bucket
        CASE
            WHEN CREDIT_SCORE >= 750 THEN 'Excellent'
            WHEN CREDIT_SCORE BETWEEN 650 AND 749 THEN 'Good'
            WHEN CREDIT_SCORE BETWEEN 550 AND 649 THEN 'Fair'
            ELSE 'Poor'
        END AS CREDIT_SCORE_CATEGORY,
        
        -- Spending Flag
        CASE
            WHEN EXPENSES > INCOME THEN 'Overspending'
            ELSE 'Within Budget'
        END AS SPENDING_FLAG

    FROM oracle_1
) t
WHERE
    t.SPENDING_FLAG = 'Overspending'
    AND t.CREDIT_SCORE_CATEGORY != 'Poor';
"},"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.SQLComponent","isCheckpointEnabled":"N","executionOption":"allparentpassorfail","excludeNotification":"N"},{"partitionOptions":{"partitionType":"","name":""},"easyQueryDefJson":{"sqlQuery":""},"componentId":11,"componentName":"SQL 11","tableName":"SQL_11","category":"Processor","componentType":"SQL","rank":0,"dataSourceName":"","displayRows":50,"dependencies":[8],"options":{"dbTable":"SELECT *
FROM (
    SELECT
        TRANSACTION_ID,
        ACCOUNT_NUMBER,
        CUSTOMER_NAME,
        TRANSACTION_DATE,
        TRANSACTION_AMOUNT,
        TRANSACTION_TYPE,
        MERCHANT,
        CATEGORY,
        CURRENCY,
        EXCHANGE_RATE,
        ACCOUNT_BALANCE,
        BRANCH_CODE,
        IS_FRAUD,
        CREDIT_SCORE,
        LOAN_STATUS,
        COALESCE(LOAN_AMOUNT, 0) AS LOAN_AMOUNT,
        COALESCE(EMI_AMOUNT, 0) AS EMI_AMOUNT,
        COALESCE(TENURE_MONTHS, 0) AS TENURE_MONTHS,
        COALESCE(INCOME, 0) AS INCOME,
        COALESCE(EXPENSES, 0) AS EXPENSES,
        COALESCE(AMOUNT_IN_USD, 0) AS AMOUNT_IN_USD,
        
        -- Fraud Label
        CASE
            WHEN IS_FRAUD = 1 THEN 'FRAUD'
            ELSE 'LEGIT'
        END AS FRAUD_LABEL,
        
        -- Loan-to-Income Ratio
        COALESCE(
            CASE
                WHEN INCOME > 0 THEN ROUND(LOAN_AMOUNT / INCOME, 4)
                ELSE 0
            END, 0
        ) AS LOAN_TO_INCOME_RATIO,
        
        -- EMI as % of Income
        COALESCE(
            CASE
                WHEN INCOME > 0 THEN ROUND((EMI_AMOUNT * TENURE_MONTHS) / INCOME * 100, 2)
                ELSE 0
            END, 0
        ) AS EMI_PCT_OF_INCOME,
        
        -- Credit Score Bucket
        CASE
            WHEN CREDIT_SCORE >= 750 THEN 'Excellent'
            WHEN CREDIT_SCORE BETWEEN 650 AND 749 THEN 'Good'
            WHEN CREDIT_SCORE BETWEEN 550 AND 649 THEN 'Fair'
            ELSE 'Poor'
        END AS CREDIT_SCORE_CATEGORY,
        
        -- Spending Flag
        CASE
            WHEN EXPENSES > INCOME THEN 'Overspending'
            ELSE 'Within Budget'
        END AS SPENDING_FLAG

    FROM oracle_1
) t
WHERE
    t.SPENDING_FLAG = 'Overspending'
    AND t.CREDIT_SCORE_CATEGORY != 'Poor';
"},"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.SQLComponent","isCheckpointEnabled":"N","executionOption":"allparentpassorfail","excludeNotification":"N"},{"sourceDataFrame":"oracle_1","targetDataFrame":"JDBC_9","mapping":[{"sourceColumn":"TRANSACTION_ID","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"transaction_id","targetType":"string","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"string","unique":"Y","columnOrder":0},{"sourceColumn":"CUSTOMER_NAME","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"customer_name","targetType":"string","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"string","unique":"N","columnOrder":0},{"sourceColumn":"TRANSACTION_AMOUNT","sourceType":"decimal(18,2)","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"decimal(18,2)","targetColumn":"transaction_amount","targetType":"decimal(18,2)","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"decimal(18,2)","unique":"N","columnOrder":0},{"sourceColumn":"MERCHANT","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"merchant","targetType":"string","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"string","unique":"N","columnOrder":0},{"sourceColumn":"CATEGORY","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"category","targetType":"string","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"string","unique":"N","columnOrder":0},{"sourceColumn":"CURRENCY","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"currency","targetType":"string","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"string","unique":"N","columnOrder":0},{"sourceColumn":"EXCHANGE_RATE","sourceType":"decimal(
